g.title: G1.1
g.text: RP trusts the PID issuer to (1)

g.title: A1.1
g.text: Sole control by the user is

g.title: G1.2
g.text: is contained in a PID that

g.title: Sn1.2.2
g.text: has not expired and is not

g.title: Sn1.2.3
g.text: RP checks that the wallet that
wallet it was issued to using

g.title: G1.4
g.text: PID issuer issues at LoA High

g.title: A_PidIssuerTrustsWb
g.text: PID issuer trusts WB to issue

g.title: Sn1.1
g.text: against its CA store of trusted

g.title: G_WbEnforcesSoleControl
g.text: WB enforces that the User has

g.title: G_PrivKeyExclusiveCustody
g.text: custody of WB and is never

g.title: G_PrivKeyRequires2fa
g.text: WB allows usage of PrivKey only

g.title: G_WbGeneratesAttestationPrivKey
g.text: WB generates a fresh WUA private

g.title: Sn_WuaSignedByDedicatedWbKey
g.text: WB signs the WUA payload with a

g.title: Sn_WuaReturnedToWallet
g.text: WUA to the wallet as response

g.title: Sn_WbSignsResponses
g.text: WB signs all its responses with

g.title: G_WbVerifiesApp
g.text: WB verifies that NL Wallet app

g.title: G_UserCanBlockWallet
g.text: User can block wallet if device

g.title: Sn_WbRevokesOnVulnerability
g.text: WB revokes keys & blocks WUA on

g.title: Sn_WbGeneratesRevocationCode
g.text: and sends it to wallet during
